sentence.Network_en: In only a thousand days, Hal and I put together a brandnew car.
sentence.Network_cn: 只花了一千个昼夜, 哈尔和我就装配出了一辆崭新的汽车.

sentence.Network_en: Ours are deluxe furnished apartments with wall - to - wall carpeting and brandnew dishwashers.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的公寓装潢豪华,地面全部铺地毯,还有全新的洗碗机.

sentence.Network_en: A brandnew oral English association is forward to your coming.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个全新的口语协会期待你的加入!

entry.def: A brand-new object is completely new.

example.ex: Yesterday he went off to buy himself a brand-new car.
example.tran: 昨天他去给自己买了一辆崭新的小汽车。
